data.name: Core Power Enhancement I
data.description: Increase the maximum AP by 500 by strengthening core power.

data.name: Enhanced Electrical Output I
data.description: Increase the electricity output to increase the speed of movement by 10%.

data.name: Redesigned Automation System I
data.description: Redesign the weapon automation system. Increases reload speed by 10%.

data.name: Barrel Rotation I
data.description: Increase the rotation speed by strengthening the motor of the gun row. Bullet firing speed increases by 5%.

data.name: Accelerated Elasticity I
data.description: It accelerates the elasticity of the lower body material and improves the jumping power. It improves the jumping power by 10%.

data.name: Enhanced Gas Output I
data.description: It significantly increases the power of hovering gas. Hovering power increases by 10%.

data.name: Firepower Reconstruction I
data.description: Reconfigures the firepower of the weapon you use. Increases damage to all weapons by 10%.

data.name: Enhanced Radar I
data.description: Strengthen radar. Rock-on distance increases by 10%.
